objects.specification: A large rectangular metallic floor panel with a smooth slightly reflective gray surface, designed to form the base of the car fair booth. The floor has a subtle brushed metal texture and a durable industrial finish to accentuate the car-themed exhibition environment.

A tall vertical exhibition wall panel with a smooth matte white finish, forming one side of the booth enclosure. The surface has a minimalist design with clean edges and subtle angular detailing, intended to showcase display banners and enhance the modern automotive presentation.

A tall vertical exhibition wall panel with a smooth matte white finish, forming one side of the booth enclosure. The surface has a minimalist design with clean edges and subtle angular detailing, intended to showcase display banners and enhance the modern automotive presentation.

A tall vertical exhibition wall panel with a smooth matte white finish, forming one side of the booth enclosure. The surface has a minimalist design with clean edges and subtle angular detailing, intended to showcase display banners and enhance the modern automotive presentation.

A sleek modern demo car with aerodynamic contours and a low-profile sports silhouette. The vehicle features a glossy metallic red finish with black tinted windows, chrome accents on the grille and rims, and high-performance black tires. The design emphasizes dynamic lines and car show aesthetics.

A sleek rectangular reception desk with a high-quality black metallic finish and a subtle red accent stripe along the front edge. The desk has a minimalist footprint, featuring a glossy surface with integrated cable management channels and a front-branded car logo panel to reinforce the automotive theme.

A vertical display banner featuring a bold car-themed design, with a red background, high-contrast white and black typography showcasing vehicle features, and a prominent brand logo near the top. The banner material has a slightly textured fabric finish and a slim minimal frame.

A vertical display banner featuring a bold car-themed design, with a red background, high-contrast white and black typography showcasing vehicle features, and a prominent brand logo near the top. The banner material has a slightly textured fabric finish and a slim minimal frame.

An overhead hanging light fixture with a slender industrial metal bar supporting a warm white LED light strip. The fixture features a brushed steel finish and diffused translucent cover to provide even illumination across the booth area, emphasizing the displayed demo car.

An overhead hanging light fixture with a slender industrial metal bar supporting a warm white LED light strip. The fixture features a brushed steel finish and diffused translucent cover to provide even illumination across the booth area, emphasizing the displayed demo car.

A low round coffee table with a black metallic top and a base inspired by a car wheel rim. The table has a subtle car-themed pattern etched into the surface and a matte finish to complement the seating area.

A car-seat-inspired visitor chair with a contoured bucket-style seat upholstered in black leather with red contrast stitching, supported by a metallic frame. The design features ergonomic cushioning and subtle automotive detailing to reflect the car fair theme.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and sculptural leaves in a modern black ceramic pot. The pot has a minimalist cylindrical shape and glossy finish, adding a natural accent to the automotive exhibition space.
